html:
3.17.20  5:19 am   Is this gonna be a great year?

     sort of

3.17.20  4:49 am   would it be wrong to consider this page less of a "ask bill a question" page, and more of a "send messages to bill" page?

     would it be wrong to consider it both

3.17.20  4:31 am   Are your songs meant to be so surreal?

     how surreal

      Or do they just come off that way

     that much is guaranteed, and i am certain it is the reason you've started this conversation

3.17.20  4:02 am   what's an unusual talent you have,that others may not?

     being a sissy

3.17.20  3:32 am   Is there anything currently in your life that necessitates a countdown timer?

     yes, extremely

3.17.20  3:27 am   Do you sleep? I scrolled through the questions list and noticed no gaps between some days. Maybe Bill Wurtz is not one person, but many persons. 

     you are on the right track. the persons who ask the questions is many persons. the times listed on this page are when the question is asked, not when it's answered. for example this question is being answered Tuesday, March 17, 2020 9:16:30 AM

3.17.20  3:14 am   Do you think universals exist as real and distinct entities, or only as mental constructs?

     what the heck is a universal, i have heard of a universe but not a universal (besides Universal studios)

3.17.20  2:52 am   where is the best place to get the latest news on audio/visuals being worked on in your area

     i will be holding a press briefing

3.17.20  2:41 am   have you played with stop-motion animation?

     not very much

3.17.20  2:09 am   how many things have you invented,

     not enough

     and how many inventions are you planning to invent?

     more

3.17.20  1:44 am   at what point does an illusion become a reality?

     on the screen, page, canvas, or stage

3.17.20  1:38 am   can i put oranges in a video 

     yes, thank you for checking with me first

3.17.20  1:14 am   Do you spell it Connor or Conner?

     i spell Connor 'Connor' and Conner 'Conner'. hope that helps

3.17.20  1:11 am   Next video plan?

     if you go to next video plan dot gov, you will see detailed information for homes and families

3.17.20  12:50 am   show us some of your drawings that you are proud of

     i would prefer to make some new ones of which to be most proud

3.17.20  12:10 am   whats your favorite piece of furniture?

     the credenza

3.17.20  12:03 am   Hello Bill. Have you considered writing a book?

     no

3.16.20  11:44 pm   When can we start healing?

     right away

3.16.20  11:37 pm   Have you rick rolled yourself

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.16.20  11:33 pm   how to write zero in roman numerals

     i think it's just a blank space

3.16.20  10:57 pm   When's the face reveal?

     never

3.16.20  10:52 pm   I can't bring myself to do anything, and when I do do something, I'm not really into it or putting myself into it and I don't go as deep and as far as I can. This is kind of affecting my ability to do things that I kind of really wanna do. Or, at least, I think I wanna do them. Am I doing things wrong?

     i'm not sure

      Should I do things differently?

     i don't know

      What should I do?

     i'm not sure

      Should I not do things for the time being?

     i don't know

     How do I know if what I think I wanna do is what I actually wanna do?

     i'm not sure

      And if it's not, then how do I figure out what it is that I actually wanna do?

     i don't know

     In 2019 I had a lot of initiative, and I loved to just work, and I guess it's possible to occupy myself with work without ever getting in touch with what I really want, but right now I find myself able to do neither.

     ah, ok. here's what's happening: there is a big important breakthrough to be had, which you are not quite seeing because your recent paradigm has actually been built up so strong that it is preventing just a slight little shake up which would be necessary to reveal the next corner to turn. life is very curvy in that way. move around, take a walk, if it's legal in your area

3.16.20  10:48 pm   How do you know where to go next?

     i don't, i have to just be imaginative, and then wait for the worry police to turn up and ask me if i think i am doing it wrong

3.16.20  10:36 pm   How many times a day does Steve climb the mountain?

     1

3.16.20  10:30 pm   why sometimes you wear glasses in your videos and sometimes not?

     this is to soften the effect of it all being technically the same person

3.16.20  9:58 pm   what is your favourite thing to click on with your mouse?

     screen coordinates i could not have predicted

3.16.20  9:51 pm   Do you ever worry that by supposedly streamlining your workflow, having 8 keyboards,

     8 and a half

     re-learning all of your software,

     well, the old software is dead so what choice do i have

     and what have you, what you're really doing is just procrastinating on *getting the music/etc made*, and explaining it all away with promises of future efficiency/possibility?

     yes

      Explain.

     You are the worry police, here to remind and suggest things for me to worry about.

      Thank you so much.

     thank You

3.16.20  9:33 pm   hello i dont want to ask anything i just wanted to say hi

     hi

3.16.20  9:30 pm   do you have a pie?

     no

3.16.20  9:20 pm   is there toilet paper?

     yes, but even more important than that, is the toilet itself

3.16.20  9:18 pm   Are there any deeper meanings to your songs

     than what

      or are they just open for interpretation?

     every bit of music that ever existed is open for interpretation

      The song "I wanna be a movie star" makes me happy for some odd reason because I think it's about being yourself? Idk explain please

     i think you may be right. i think i tried to explain that one another time, let me see. here

3.16.20  9:17 pm   I hope you know that your songs bring me and my friends lots of enjoyment during the self isolation ^^

     holy handsoap you are very friendly

3.16.20  8:56 pm   Do you ever wonder why woodchucks can't actually chuck wood?

     no

3.16.20  8:51 pm   what is your favourite key to write music in? 

     if you don't let me use different keys i will rise up in protest

3.16.20  8:38 pm   what's the best shape 

     if you don't let me use multiple shapes together i will rise up in protest

3.16.20  8:18 pm   Is life epic for you right now? Because you gotta make sure life is epic. You deserve it; and if it's not, do what you need to to make it epic.

     that's true, i'm glad you reminded me

3.16.20  8:15 pm   what is the best color of all time

     if you don't let me use multiple colors together i will rise up in protest

3.16.20  7:52 pm   How do I actually care about class when I'm not physically there so that it doesn't become like homework that I just half ignore?

     the class is gonna have to be good. that's the only way

3.16.20  7:37 pm   out of all of the days, which one is your favorite?

     today

3.16.20  7:19 pm   Can a cheese burger be a cheese burger without cheese?

     [Calculating] no

3.16.20  7:10 pm   describe your exact status right now in the best way possible.

     ok

3.16.20  7:06 pm   Do you think finland;

     yes

3.16.20  6:45 pm   can you use a capital letter

     yes i do it all the time. but can you

3.16.20  6:30 pm   Why does everyone keep saying the "might quit" video is legit

     of course it's legit. it's a song, with a video to go with it. songs and videos are one of my strong points

3.16.20  6:28 pm   Where is earth going?

     find out, next

3.16.20  6:02 pm   What should I name my guitar?

     which guitar is it

3.16.20  5:44 pm   Why do you answer questions at three in the morning?

     what makes you think you know when i answer questions, and another follow up question i have is why do you ask them at 5:44 in the evening

3.16.20  5:39 pm   they shut down a lot of stuff due to toe coronavirus, is it REALLY that bad?

     not yet. but that's the whole trick, it's delayed

3.16.20  5:31 pm   people are scared and are freaking out. what is your solution to people being scared and freaking out over you not uploading?

     try to freak out more than them

3.16.20  5:19 pm   Do eggs exist

     oh that would explain a lot
